title: [Large-Scale] Open Educational Resources (OER) Utilization and Open Learning Design (OLD) Strategies

context.prior_knowledge: Basic digital literacy and experience in managing educational resources
context.additional_context: Need to strengthen OER-based instructional design competencies considering geographically dispersed learner environments

learning_goals: Learners can explain the concept of OER (Open Educational Resources) and their educational applicability.
Learners can design blended learning environments according to the OLD (Open Learning Design) principles.
Learners can develop and apply OER-based educational materials in real-world work contexts.
Learners can propose OER-utilized educational models through project-based assessment.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
